synthesis_conditions.general_information: The synthesis conditions specifically for the preparation of complexes 1 and 2 are not detailed in the provided text. The text focuses on the structural determination and characterization of these complexes using solid-state NMR spectroscopy.

The synthesis conditions specifically for the preparation of complex 1a are not detailed in the provided text. The text focuses on the structural determination and characterization of this complex using solid-state NMR spectroscopy.

The synthesis conditions specifically for the preparation of the diamagnetic LuIII complex 3a are not detailed in the provided text. The text focuses on the structural determination and characterization of this complex using solid-state NMR spectroscopy.

experimental_section.general_information: The text mentions that full experimental procedures regarding sample preparation, a summary of crystallographic details, and solid-state NMR spectra acquisition and analysis are available in the Supporting Information. However, these details are not provided within the main text.
